content: {A惊叹}Never thought we'd be welcoming our first neighbor so soon! How wonderful!

content: Mo worries, <style=Highlight>Loomi Co.</style> has arranged a temporary place for you to stay. More importantly, you'll definitely love the place <style=PlayerName>{me}</style> is going to pick for you.

content: Since you've decided to stay, about where you'll be staying...

content: {A害羞冒烟}I-I'm sorry~! I keep sayin' I wanna stand on my own two feet, but I haven't prepared for anythin' at all... Well, apart from farmin'...

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, Yunguo, welcome back. Hoho? That fresh tomato scent... Looks like the planet's flavor palette is growing richer.

content: {A笑眯眯}I'm so happy <style=PlayerName>{me}</style> invited me to live here with you. I-I'll do my bestest to stand on my own two feet!

content: Thank ya kindly~! No matter where I live, I know I'll be just right as rain. But if it's okay... <style=SizeSmall>can I live next door to you, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>...?</style>
